name: Gas Runner
description:
Gas Runner

This game is about a scientist that has got a new job on a laboratory, but accidentally he breaks a strange crystal that produces gas behind him, and he has to run away from it, there are 4 levels on different ubications, the lab (two levels), the forest, and the mountain. He needs to find a mage that will heal it.

Credits:Programmer: SMH_StudiosDesigner: ALD_StudiosMusic: ALD_Studios & SMH_StudiosSound effects: SMH_StudiosAnd thanks to WaxWolf!All sounds effects, code, art and music was made during the GMTK Game Jam.
